name: 叉燒包
english name: Char siu bao, Barbecued pork bun
description: Bun with barbecued pork filling steamed to be white and fluffy

name: 腸粉
description: Steamed rice noodles with or without meat or vegetable fillings, served with sweet soy sauce

name: 蛋撻
description: Baked tart with egg custard filling

name: 鳳爪
description: Deep fried, boiled, and then steamed chicken feet with 豆豉 dau6si6 (fermented black beans) sauce

name: 芥蘭
description: Steamed vegetables served with oyster sauce and garlic

name: 金錢肚
english name: Honeycomb beef tripe, Reticulum beef tripe

name: 蝦餃
description: Steamed dumpling with shrimp (and often bamboo shoots) filling wrapped in a translucent wrapper made from wheat and tapioca starch

name: 蘿蔔糕
description: Shredded white radish, bits of dried shrimp, Chinese sausage and mushroom that is steamed, sliced, and pan-fried

name: 烧卖
english name: Siu mai, Pork and shrimp dumpling
description: Steamed dumplings with pork and prawns, usually topped off with crab roe and mushroom

name: 芋角
description: Deep-fried dumpling made with mashed taro and stuffed with diced mushrooms, shrimp and pork

name: 煎堆
description: Deep-fried chewy dough with various fillings (lotus seed, black bean, red bean pastes) coated in sesame seeds
